title: IT'S TOMORROW! [CSIE Speech Venue Changed] 5/3 Heroic Odyssey: A Sonnet of My Days in Diplomacy by TaiwanICDF Secretary General
content:
分類： 活動公告, 演講暨研討會
來源： 資訊工程學系 - 謝嘉文 - cbjiawen@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話8905026
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： IT'S TOMORROW! [CSIE Speech Venue Changed] 5/3 Heroic Odyssey: A Sonnet of My Days in Diplomacy by TaiwanICDF Secretary General
日期： Thu, 2 May 2024 17:23:21 +0800

[CSIE Speech] 5/3 Heroic Odyssey: A Sonnet of My Days in Diplomacy by TaiwanICDF Secretary General

Explore the World Through the Eyes of a Taiwanese Ambassador: Join the “Heroic Odyssey: A Sonnet of My Days in Diplomacy” Speech to Broaden Your Global Perspective!

Are you curious about the life of a diplomat? How do diplomats negotiate international agreements across different cultures, handle high-stakes situations, and maintain international friendships? Or how can a small nation like Taiwan make a big impact on the global stage?

On May 3rd, the Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering is thrilled to invite the highly esteemed Amb. Charles C. Li, Secretary General of the International Cooperation and Development Fund (TaiwanICDF), to share his challenges and wisdom as a diplomat and give an exciting speech on his almost 40-year diplomatic career—Heroic Odyssey: A Sonnet of My Days in Diplomacy.

To facilitate active interactions and communication, we’re calling for questions to be addressed and answered on the event day. If you're interested, please refer to the following section for more information on the Secretary General to orient your questions and fill out this online survey: [CSIE] Call for Questions – Heroic Odyssey: A Sonnet of My Days in Diplomacy by TaiwanICDF Secretary General Charles C. Li. Moreover, a solid 7 Bonus Hours, including 3 Cross-Domain Learning Hours & 1 Service Learning Hour for attendance, and 3 Cross-Domain or Service Learning Hours for raising questions, will be offered to motivate and encourage your participation! Register and complete the Call for the Questions Survey by 12:00 on April 29 (Monday) to secure them! ;)


【Speech Title】 Heroic Odyssey: A Sonnet of My Days in Diplomacy
【Speaker】 Amb. Charles C. Li, TaiwanICDF Secretary General
【Time】13:00-16:00 on May 3 (Friday), 2024
【Venue】 Student Activity Center Lecture Hall, NDHU

*This is a physical lecture. Please be on time for this event.
*Due to the air-conditioning failure of the original venue, the venue has been  changed to the Student Activities Center Lecture Hall.

【Call for Questions Survey Link】https://reurl.cc/p3WLLr
【Registration Link】 https://reurl.cc/Vzj84N
